attributes.action: create fair and equal recruitment policies in all british police forces.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: No special treatment should be given to any section of society when recruiting new officers or promoting existing officers. Currently, special treatment is given to ethnic minorities and female candidates for recruitment and promotion. "Fairness" in the police needs to be restored by giving everyone, regardless of who they are, the same chance of recruitment and career development.
